snippet: Representative Frank Pallone of New Jersey has long wanted to join the Senate, but has let opportunities pass; now he is exploring whether to run for the seat Frank R. Lautenberg will vacate next year.
abstract: Representative Frank Pallone of New Jersey, who has long wanted to join the Senate but has let opportunities pass, is now exploring whether to run for the seat Frank R Lautenberg will vacate in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Representative Frank Pallone of New Jersey has long wanted to join the Senate, but has let opportunities pass; now he is exploring whether to run for the seat Frank R. Lautenberg will vacate next year.

headline.seo: Pallone to Explore Chances for Senate Seat
headline.main: Senate Race May Be Last Chance for Cautious Congressman to Fulfill Dream
headline.print_headline: Senate Race May Be Last Chance for Cautious Congressman to Fulfill Dream
